General.Title: North America Weather Today
General.Abstract: METAR is the international standard code format for hourly surface weather observations which is analogous to the SA coding currently used in the US. The acronym roughly translates from French as Aviation Routine Weather Report. These hourly weather reports is harvested by Compusult for North American Airports

Server.title: Canada Centre for Remote Sensing Web Map Service

Layer.Title: Coastlines
Layer.Abstract: VRF Narrative Table for "Coastlines":Coastline / shorelines (BA010) have been portrayed for coastal islands but not inland islands.

Server.title: Compusult Limited METAR Weather Mapping service

Layer.Name: WEATHER
Layer.Title: North American Hourly METAR Weather Reports
Layer.Abstract: METAR is the international standard code format for hourly surface weather observations which is analogous to the SA coding currently used in the US. The acronym roughly translates from French as Aviation Routine Weather Report. These hourly weather reports is harvested by Compusult for North American Airports
